duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute laboratory experiments in compliance with Good Laboratory Practices (GLP) and customer requirements.
Setup, design, and conduct experiments, while managing laboratory equipment and following protocols.
Evaluate the success of laboratory tests and recommend next steps based on findings.
Perform routine qualitative and quantitative laboratory procedures under minimal supervision, following safety protocols and GLP.
Analyze and report laboratory test results in a timely manner to contribute to scientific meetings and project outcomes.
Accurately document all laboratory procedures following customer requirements and SOPs.
Manage responsibilities while following scientific direction, prioritizing tasks, and meeting deadlines.

education_certification.credential: PhD in applied/laboratory sciences preferred; Masters with 3-5 years of direct laboratory experience or Undergraduate degree with 5-7 years of direct laboratory experience also considered.
